0.9.9.en: Handle adding several devices at the same time.

0.9.8.en: Handle adding several devices at the same time.

0.9.7.en: Name standard for measurements can be changed. Zone id and name as tags.

0.9.6.en: Support for InfluxDB v2 and InfluxDb Cloud.

0.9.2.en: Added logging of Homey metrics.  Added protocol, username and password to settings.
